Agnes Matilda Kalibata bụ onye ọkà mmụta sayensị na onye na-eme iwu na Rwandan, yana onye isi otu Alliance for a Green Revolution in Africa (AGRA)
Ọ jere ozi dịka onye minista ọrụ ugbo na akụrụngwa nke Rwanda site na 2008 ruo 2014 wee malite ọrụ ya dị ka onye isi oche nke Alliance for a Green Revolution in Africa (AGRA) na 2014.
A mụrụ Kalibata na Rwanda ma zụlitere dị ka onye gbara ọsọ ndụ na Uganda nye ndị nne na nna bụ ndị obere ihe
O nwetara akara ugo mmụta bachelor na entomology na biochemistry, wee nweta nzere masta na ọrụ ugbo, ha abụọ na Mahadum Makerere dị na Uganda
na entomology sitere na Mahadum Massachusetts Amherst

Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 2005, ọ mere nyocha na Kawanda Agricultural Research Institute na International Institute of Tropical Agriculture, na mmekorita ya na Mahadum Makerere nke Uganda na Mahadum Massachusetts.
